# cameraDevice

**Instance Property**

The camera used by the image picker controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cameraDevice: UIImagePickerController.CameraDevice { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/CameraDevice-swift.enum/rear].

## Related Documentation

- **isFlashAvailable(for:)**: Queries whether the specified camera has flash illumination capability.
- **availableCaptureModes(for:)**: Retrieves the capture modes supported by the specified camera device.

## Configuring the camera to use

- **isCameraDeviceAvailable(_:)**: Queries whether the specified camera is available.
- **UIImagePickerController.CameraDevice**: Constants that specify the camera to use for image or movie capture.
